019package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
026
027import java.time.Instant;
028import java.time.LocalDate;
029import java.time.LocalDateTime;
030import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
031import java.util.Optional;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal.ProcessingInstructionImpl;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Element;
037
038/**
039 *  <p>{@summary The definition for a processing instruction.}</p>
040 *  <p>According to the specification, an XML processing instruction have this
041 *  general structure</p>
042 *  <pre><code>&lt;?<i>name</i> <i>data</i> ?&gt;</code></pre>
043 *  <p>with <i>{@code data}</i> being arbitrary text as defined by the target
044 *  processor that responds to the respective processing instruction.</p>
045 *  <p>But in many cases, this <i>{@code data}</i> will be structured like
046 *  regular XML attributes.</p>
047 *  <p>Therefore we provide both API: with
048 *  {@link #addData(CharSequence)}
049 *  plain text can be added, with the various
050 *  {@link #setAttribute(String, CharSequence) setAttribute()}
051 *  methods the data will be formatted as attributes.</p>
052 *
053 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
054 *  @version $Id: ProcessingInstruction.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $
055 *  @since 0.0.5
056 *
057 *  @UMLGraph.link
058 */
059@SuppressWarnings( "preview" )
060@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ProcessingInstruction.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $" )
061@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
062public sealed interface ProcessingInstruction extends Element
063    permits ProcessingInstructionImpl
064{
065        /*---------*\
066    ====** Methods **==========================================================
067        \*---------*/
068    /**
069     *  Adds data to the processing instruction.
070     *
071     *  @param  data    The data to add.
072     *  @return This instance.
073     */
074    public ProcessingInstruction addData( final CharSequence data );
075
076    /**
077     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
078     *  <p>The method uses
079     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
080     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
081     *
082     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
083     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value.
084     *  @return This instance.
085     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
086     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
087     */
088    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
089    {
090        return setAttribute( name, Boolean.toString( flag ) );
091    }   //  setAttribute()
092
093    /**
094     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
095     *  <p>The method uses
096     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
097     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
098     *
099     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
100     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
101     *      attribute will be removed.
102     *  @return This instance.
103     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
104     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
105     */
106    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
107    {
108        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( flag ) ? Boolean.toString( flag ) : null );
109    }   //  setAttribute()
110
111    /**
112     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
113     *
114     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
115     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
116     *      attribute will be removed.
117     *  @return This instance.
118     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
119     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
120     */
121    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
122    {
123        return setAttribute( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ), value, Optional.empty() );
124    }   //  setAttribute()
125
126    /**
127     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
128     *
129     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
130     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
131     *      attribute will be removed.
132     *  @param  append  If not
133     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}, the new value will be appended
134     *      on an already existing one, and this sequence is used as the
135     *      separator.
136     *  @return This instance.
137     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
138     *      not valid for the element.
139     */
140    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
141    public ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException;
142
143    /**
144     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
145     *  <p>The method uses
146     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
147     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
148     *
149     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
150     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
151     *  @return This instance.
152     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
153     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
154     */
155    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final double number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
156    {
157        return setAttribute( name, Double.toString( number ) );
158    }   //  setAttribute()
159
160    /**
161     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
162     *  <p>The method uses
163     *  {@link Enum#name()}
164     *  to convert the provided value to a {@code String}.</p>
165     *
166     *  @param  <E> The concrete enum type of {@code value}.
167     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
168     *  @param  enumValue   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
169     *      attribute will be removed.
170     *  @return This instance.
171     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
172     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
173     */
174    public default <E extends Enum<E>> ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final E enumValue ) throws IllegalArgumentException
175    {
176        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( enumValue ) ? enumValue.name() : null );
177    }   //  setAttribute()
178
179    /**
180     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
181     *  <p>The method uses
182     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
183     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
184     *
185     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
186     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
187     *      attribute will be removed.
188     *  @return This instance.
189     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
190     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
191     */
192    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final Instant date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
193    {
194        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );
195    }   //  setAttribute()
196
197    /**
198     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
199     *  <p>The method uses
200     *  {@link Integer#toString(int)}
201     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
202     *
203     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
204     *  @param  number  The attribute's value.
205     *  @return This instance.
206     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
207     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
208     */
209    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final int number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
210    {
211        return setAttribute( name, Integer.toString( number ) );
212    }   //  setAttribute()
213
214    /**
215     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
216     *  <p>The method uses
217     *  {@link LocalDate#toString()}
218     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
219     *
220     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
221     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
222     *      attribute will be removed.
223     *  @return This instance.
224     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
225     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
226     */
227    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDate date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
228    {
229        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );
230    }   //  setAttribute()
231
232    /**
233     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
234     *  <p>The method uses
235     *  {@link LocalDateTime#toString()}
236     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
237     *
238     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
239     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
240     *      attribute will be removed.
241     *  @return This instance.
242     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
243     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
244     */
245    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
246    {
247        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );
248    }   //  setAttribute()
249
250    /**
251     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
252     *  <p>The method uses
253     *  {@link Long#toString(long)}
254     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
255     *
256     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
257     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
258     *  @return This instance.
259     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
260     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
261     */
262    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final long number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
263    {
264        return setAttribute( name, Long.toString( number ) );
265    }   //  setAttribute()
266
267    /**
268     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
269     *  <p>The method uses
270     *  {@link Number#toString()}
271     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
272     *
273     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
274     *  @param  number   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
275     *      attribute will be removed.
276     *  @return This instance.
277     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
278     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
279     */
280    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final Number number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
281    {
282        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( number ) ? number.toString() : null );
283    }   //  setAttribute()
284
285    /**
286     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
287     *  <p>The method uses
288     *  {@link ZonedDateTime#toString()}
289     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
290     *
291     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
292     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
293     *      attribute will be removed.
294     *  @return This instance.
295     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
296     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
297     */
298    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttribute( final String name, final ZonedDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
299    {
300        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );
301    }   //  setAttribute()
302
303    /**
304     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided
305     *  value is not empty.}</p>
306     *  <p>The method uses
307     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils#isNotEmpty(CharSequence)}
308     *  to test if the given value is empty.</p>
309     *
310     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
311     *  @param  value   The value for the attribute; can be {@code null}.
312     *  @return This instance.
313     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
314     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
315     */
316    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
317    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
318    {
319        if( isNotEmpty( value ) ) setAttribute( name, value );
320
321        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
322        return this;
323    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
324
325    /**
326     *  Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided value is not
327     *  empty.
328     *
329     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
330     *  @param  optional   The value for the attribute.
331     *  @return This instance.
332     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
333     *      not valid for the element, or no attributes are allowed at all.
334     */
335    @SuppressWarnings( {"UnusedReturnValue", "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType"} )
336    public default ProcessingInstruction setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> optional ) throws IllegalArgumentException
337    {
338        requireNonNullArgument( optional, "optional" ).ifPresent( value -> setAttribute( name, value ) );
339
340        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
341        return this;
342    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
343}
344//  interface ProcessingInstruction
345
346/*
347 *  End of File
